description:
Here's the post credit scene for The Fantastic Four: First Steps.

🛡️ Dr. Doom Arrives in New York – Clip (2025) | Robert Downey Jr 🛡️
The mask is off. In a chilling post-credits reveal, Doctor Doom steps into the world — and New York will never be the same.

Clip Overview
Captured from The Fantastic Four: First Steps, this scene teases Doom’s first move in the MCU. In a dimly lit Baxter Building, a cloaked figure confronts Franklin Richards, holding his mask like a prophecy in motion. Though we don’t see much, the energy of arrival is electrifying.


A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.
